suite.name: Amazon Testes

test.name: Caso de Teste 01 - Acesso ao menu "Livros"

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (119.0.6045.105) detected in PATH at C:\webdrivers\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (120.0.6099.129); currently, chromedriver 120.0.6099.109 is recommended for chrome 120.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Acessar a home page do site Amazon.com.br
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verificar se aparece a frase "Loja de Livros"
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Verificar se o título da página fica "Livros | Amazon.com.br"
kw.sourcename: Verificar se o título da página fica "${TITULO}"

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Este teste verifica o menu Livros do site da Amazon e a categoria Livros em Oferta

test.name: Caso de Teste 02 - Pesquisa de um produto

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: The chromedriver version (119.0.6045.105) detected in PATH at C:\webdrivers\chromedriver.exe might not be compatible with the detected chrome version (120.0.6099.129); currently, chromedriver 120.0.6099.109 is recommended for chrome 120.*, so it is advised to delete the driver in PATH and retry

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Acessar a home page do site Amazon.com.br
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Digitar o nome do produto "É Assim que Acaba" no campo de Pesquisa
kw.sourcename: Digitar o nome do produto "${PRODUTO}" no campo de Pesquisa

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'É Assim que Acaba' into text field 'twotabsearchtextbox'.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verificar o resultado da pesquisa, listando o produto "É Assim que Acaba"
kw.sourcename: Verificar o resultado da pesquisa, listando o produto "${PRODUTO}"

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Este teste verifica a busca de um produto

suite.doc: Esta suíte testa o site da amazon.com.br
